Miralem Pjanic: Tak Ada Tim yang Kalah karena Wasit
01 Nov 2019, 23:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sejumlah wasit menjadi sorotan karena kepemimpinannya yang dinilai kurang apik di pekan ke-10 Serie A tengah pekan ini. Pemain Juventus, Miralem Pjanic, mulai iba dan lelah melihat perangkat pertandingan yang terus disalahkan atas kekalahan sebuah tim.
Seperti yang dilansir dari Football Italia, diketahui bahwa sejumlah laga di pekan ke-10 Serie A dihiasi oleh banyak permasalahan. Beberapa di antaranya berhubungan dengan kualitas kepemimpinan wasit.
Sebagai respon, asosiasi wasit Italia alias AIA memberhentikan untuk sementara beberapa sosok sebagai buntut atas kejadian tersebut. Salah duanya adalah Piero Giacomelli dan Massimiliano Irrati. Mereka takkan memimpin pertandingan Serie A akhir pekan ini.
Laga antara Juventus melawan Genoa, yang digelar pada hari Kamis (31/10/2019), juga disorot walau tak terlalu ramai dibicarakan. Seperti yang diketahui, skuat asuhan Maurizio Sarri itu meraih kemenangan berkat hadiah penalti yang diberikan pada menit-menit akhir.

Miralem Pjanic: There is no team that loses because of the referee
Nov 01 2019, 23:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A number of referees are in the spotlight because of his leadership which is considered less slick in the 10th week of Serie A this week. Juventus player, Miralem Pjanic, began to pity and was tired of seeing the match that continued to be blamed for the defeat of a team.
As reported by the Italian Football, it is known that a number of matches in Week 10 of Serie A are adorned by many problems. Some of them relate to the quality of referee leadership.
In response, the Italian referees association alias AIA temporarily suspended several figures in the aftermath of the incident. One of them is Piero Giacomelli and Massimiliano Irrati. They will not lead Serie A matches this weekend.
The match between Juventus and Genoa, which was held on Thursday (10/31/2019), was also highlighted although it was not too much talked about. As is known, Maurizio Sarri's squad won the victory thanks to a penalty given in the final minutes.
